channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Surviving the Great Flattening: The coming extinction of the middle manager
item.description: For a century, firms built moats around knowledge, the exact layer of experts in the middle that is now being thinned from the herd.

item.title: Patients Win with Free Speech for Pharmaceutical Ads
item.description: Patients should be free to choose what products they want, but also be free to learn about them.

item.title: Abolish the FCC
